meanings.definition: A circular painting or relief sculpture
meanings.sent1: The art gallery displayed beautiful tondos on its walls.
meanings.sent2: The artist created a tondos of a serene landscape.
meanings.sent3: The tondos in the museum seemed to come alive and tell stories.
meanings.sent4: Her tondos were like portals to another world, drawing viewers in.
meanings.sent5: The intricate details of the tondos made them truly mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A round or oval architectural feature
meanings.sent1: The cathedral's grand architecture included stunning tondos above the entrance.
meanings.sent2: The ancient building had intricate tondos adorning its walls.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous pigeons perched on the tondos, enjoying the view.
meanings.sent4: The tondos added a touch of elegance to the otherwise plain structure.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the tondos created a beautiful pattern on the floor.

meanings.definition: A circular or oval window or skylight
meanings.sent1: The attic room was bright thanks to the tondos on the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: She gazed up at the tondos, watching the clouds drift by.
meanings.sent3: The curious cat tried to catch the sunlight filtering through the tondos.
meanings.sent4: The tondos in the roof allowed a glimpse of the starry night sky.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze entered through the tondos, bringing a sense of freshness.
